system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice patterns_with to and -ing by Discussing hobbies with 'enjoy + ing'. I want to ensure that I can use 'enjoy' followed by the '-ing' form. For example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Let's do a Q&A exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. Tell me What you enjoy doing. Then ask me the same with short questions. (I enjoy reading. What do you enjoy doing?', 'When Igo out I enjoy dancing. How about you?') Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing hobbies with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy reading books. What do you enjoy doing?
Hello! I enjoy playing soccer. What else do you enjoy doing?
Hello! I also enjoy cooking. When I go outside, I enjoy walking in the park. How about you? What do you enjoy doing when you go outside?
conversation.advanced_content: Hello! I also enjoy cooking. When I go out, I enjoy walking in the park. How about you? What do you enjoy doing when you go out?

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy going hiking when I go outside. What do you enjoy doing at home?
Hello! At home, I enjoy watching movies. I also enjoy listening to music. What about you? What do you enjoy doing at home?
Hello! At home, I enjoy painting. I also enjoy reading novels. What about you? What else do you enjoy doing?
Hello! I also enjoy playing the guitar at home. It’s been great talking about hobbies with you! Keep practicing, and you’ll get even better at using “enjoy + -ing.” Good luck! 😊
Hello! Thank you for the conversation. I enjoy learning new things. I also enjoy writing stories. It’s been fun practicing English with you! 😊 What else do you enjoy doing?
Good job! You have completed the task. I enjoy chatting with you and helping you practice. Continue doing well, and talk to you later! 😊
conversation.advanced_content: Good job! You have completed the task. I enjoy chatting with you and helping you practice. Keep up the great work, and talk to you later! 😊
